author: AAA3A
name: AntiRaid
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog! 
Do `[p]help` to get the list of commands and their description. 
It does not use user data.
short: A cog to remove all permissions from a person who deletes a channel.
description: Have you ever dreamed of preventing a raid by automatically removing all the permissions of someone who removes a channel from your server? Then this cog is for you!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
